channel.title: MBCT Trainee Hub
channel.description: Updates and highlights from the MBCT Trainee Hub at Stanford.

item.title: Welcome to the MBCT Trainee Hub
item.description: The MBCT Trainee Hub is a collaborative space for bios, lectures, interviews, and opportunities that connect mind, brain, computation, and technology.

item.title: Trainee Bios and Directory
item.description: Share your bio, research interests, and ways to collaborate with the MBCT community.

item.title: Lecture and Workshop Highlights
item.description: Curated learning sessions featuring MBCT trainees, faculty, and collaborators.
